column5: Fine thing to see after waking up from my morning nap !    Bring up an auger on the weekend Meely...

Funny you mention this.  It is starting to snow here too.  On the radio they are saying it is really bad in Kingston.  All I can say is, better now than Sunday when I'll be going after the big toothy critters.
Checked my birdbath in the yard yesterday and to day. Forget swimming they better learn how to skate!  Wiatom Willy my
Beans...that's not snow...  Seems to me you have a fungal problem on your lawn.  Being in denial doesn't make my explanation wrong does it?
Forget the snow - how do I score morning naps?!?!
OMG, my eyes have turned blind now!

Had some of that in Barrie this morning too  but it didn't stay on the lawn like that thank goodness....but then as it's my vacation I expected nothing less   Ya have to wait until you're a retired old fart for those  Maureen
